name: Gourmet Breakfast Bag
description: This gift set comes complete with 1 All Natural Gourmet Baking Mix, 1 Syrup, 1 pancake mold (Santa hat or heart - available seasonally). The Wild Breakfast Bag and the Gourmet Breakfast Bag make a great gift for anyone who loves pancakes or waffles. Our gourmet baking mix is paired with your favorite syrup for an extra special treat, just make your syrup selection below! Our Breakfast Gift Sets come nicely wrapped in a cellophane gift sack, complete with bow.

name: HOT Razzmatazz Jammin' Sauce - Buy 3 and Save!
description:
3 jars - 16 fl. oz. each
Do you like sweet and spicy flavor with your favorite meats? You have got to try this amazing sauce; its raspberries, blueberries, blackberries, and jalapenos in a sauce that compliments any meat. We like to pour over meatballs and serve warm for a quick and easy appetizer. It's also nice with your holiday ham or turkey and fabulous with brisket. Try one today and serve at your next get together and your friends will be wanting the recipe! Ingredients: Sugar, jalapenos, raspberries, blackberries, blueberries, pectin (dextrose, fumaric acid, fruit pectin), prayer

name: Gourmet Jalapeno Pepper Jelly - 3 pack!
description:
3 jars of each flavor - 8 fl. oz. each
Buy our pepper jellies as a 3 pack and save! You'll get the following jelly flavors in this 3 pack:

Green Jalapeno Jelly

HOT! Jalapeno Jelly

Razzmatazz Jalapeno Jelly

name: Maryland China Dish and FREE 1/2 lb. Toffee
description:
FREE 1/2 lb. of toffee with Dish Purchase! Perfect Gift for Mom on Mother's Day!

We are including a free 1/2 lb. of our delicious gourmet toffee with this purchase! Keep a dish of gourmet toffee on your table with this antique reproduction porcelain nut bowl. The 5.75" long bowl has a stand keeping it upright and a handle for carrying. Small nut scoop included with bowl. Made in China. Microwavable and dishwasher safe. Please note: the scoop is intended to rest in the bowl and is shown hanging from the handle for display purposes only.

name: 1 lb. Homemade Gourmet English Toffee
description: This toffee has been a family favorite of ours for years. One bite and it will be a favorite in your family too. We begin with crisp chunks of roasted almonds in rich, hand-stirred, creamy butter toffee. We cover that with milk chocolate on one side, dark chocolate on the other side and finish off with a coating of ground almonds. Let one melt in your mouth and you’ll be coming back for more! Also available in our 1/2 lb. size! Ingredients: Butter, roasted almonds, milk and semi-sweet chocolate (sugar, unsweetened chocolate, cocoa, butter, whole milk powder, milk fat, soy lecithin – an emulsifier, vanilla), sugar, water, corn syrup, prayer

name: Wild Chokecherry Syrup
description:
12 fl. oz.
Made from native wild cherries that we hand pick on our land and along the road ditches in the sand hills of Nebraska, these cherries are renowned for their somewhat tart flavor. Chokecherries have been around for many years. In fact, they were first used by Native Americans to preserve their meat. This syrup in not only fantastic in place of maple syrup, it's amazing poured over ice cream! One bite of this unique flavored jelly and you will be hooked on this hard to find flavor. Ingredients: Sugar, wild chokecherry juice, pectin (dextrose, fumaric acid, fruit pectin), prayer

name: 8 oz. Candy Apple Jelly
description: This jelly will only be up for a limited time only! We have decided to make it a seasonal product. Order now and stock up if it is a favorite! Do you love cinnamon apples? If you answered yes, then this jelly is for you! It is bursting with cinnamon apple flavor and is a beautiful clear red color. This jelly makes a great glaze for ham. Ingredients: Sugar, apple juice, cinnamon candy (sugar, corn syrup, maltodextrin, gum Arabic, natural and artificial flavors, artificial colors including FD & C red #40 and carnauba was), pectin (dextrose, fumaric acid, fruit pectin), prayer Available in three sizes: 4.5 oz, 8 oz, and 10 oz.!

name: HOT Razzmatazz Jammin' Sauce
description:
16 fl. oz.
Do you like sweet and spicy flavor with your favorite meats? You have got to try this amazing sauce; its raspberries, blueberries, blackberries, and jalapenos in a sauce that compliments any meat. We like to pour over meatballs and serve warm for a quick and easy appetizer. It's also nice with your holiday ham or turkey and fabulous with brisket. Try one today and serve at your next get together and your friends will be wanting the recipe! Ingredients: Sugar, jalapenos, raspberries, blackberries, blueberries, pectin (dextrose, fumaric acid, fruit pectin), prayer

name: Nebraska Jellies Gift Box (8 oz. ea.)
description: The Perfect Gift Perfect for gift giving, this 4 pack features 2 of our native jellies and 2 of our gourmet jellies in our 8 oz. size. Flavors may vary from what is shown in product photos. Flavors Include: Wild Chokecherry Jelly, Wild Plum Jelly, Razzmatazz Jam, and Candy Apply Jelly Click here to order Nebraska Jellies Gift Box in our 4.5 oz. size!

name: 8 oz. Razzmatazz Jam
description: We created this jam with raspberries, blackberries and blueberries and made it soft enough that it can be poured. It is great on biscuits, peanut butter sandwiches, poured on pancakes and even ice cream or cheesecake. We like to take a sheet cake, pour the jam over the top and finish with whipped topping for a refreshing ice box cake. Ingredients: Sugar, raspberries, blueberries, blackberries, pectin (dextrose, fumaric acid, fruit pectin), prayer Available in three sizes: 4 oz, 8 oz, and 10 oz! Try our sugar-free version of Razzmatazz Jam!

name: Wild Breakfast Bag
description: This gift set comes complete with 1 All Natural Gourmet Baking Mix, 1 Syrup, 1 pancake mold (Santa hat or heart - available seasonally). The Wild Breakfast Bag and the Gourmet Breakfast Bag make a great gift for anyone who loves pancakes or waffles. Our gourmet baking mix is paired with your favorite syrup for an extra special treat, just make your syrup selection below! Our Breakfast Gift Sets come nicely wrapped in a cellophane gift sack, complete with bow.

name: 1/2 lb. Homemade Gourmet English Toffee
description: This toffee has been a family favorite of ours for years. One bite and it will be a favorite in your family too. We begin with crisp chunks of roasted almonds in rich, hand-stirred, creamy butter toffee. We cover that with milk chocolate on one side, dark chocolate on the other side and finish off with a coating of ground almonds. Let one melt in your mouth and you’ll be coming back for more! Ingredients: Butter, roasted almonds, milk and semi-sweet chocolate (sugar, unsweetened chocolate, cocoa, butter, whole milk powder, milk fat, soy lecithin – an emulsifier, vanilla), sugar, water, corn syrup, prayer

name: All Natural Gourmet Baking Mix
description:
Makes biscuits, scones, pancakes or waffles. We developed this mix to compliment all of our jellies, jams, and syrups and be a healthy, no preservative alternative to other baking mixes. It comes in a handy 16 oz., one use bag, and makes biscuits, scones, pancakes or waffles. Feel free to add your favorite fruit or nuts! This mix can be used in place of other baking mixes. We like to add garlic powder and Cajun seasoning (try JB's Fat Boy or Hollman's) for a great breading for fish, seafood, or chicken. 
Unbleached enriched flour (iron, thiamin, niacin, riboflavin, folic acid), granulated sugar, non-aluminum baking powder, baking soda, sea salt, prayer

name: 8 oz. Wild Chokecherry Jelly
description: Made from native wild cherries that we hand pick on our land and along the road ditches in the sand hills of Nebraska, these cherries are renowned for their somewhat tart flavor. Chokecherries have been around for many years. In fact, they were first used by Native Americans to preserve their meat. One bite of this unique flavored jelly and you will be hooked on this hard to find flavor. Ingredients: Sugar, wild chokecherry juice, pectin (dextrose, fumaric acid, fruit pectin), prayer Available in three sizes: 4.5 oz, 8 oz, and 10 oz.!

name: French Vanilla Maple Syrup
description:
12 fl. oz.
This syrup is like our Simply Maple. It's all natural and is made without corn syrup. It has an exquisite, rich, French vanilla flavor and is one of our most popular syrups. Ingredients: Brown sugar, water, natural maple and French vanilla flavors and extracts, prayer

name: Simply Maple Syrup
description:
12 fl. oz.
We developed our line of maple syrups because you cannot go into the store and by an all natural syrup without corn syrup unless you buy 100% pure maple syrup. This is a wonderful tasting, healthier alternative! Use like any pancake syrup. See our website for some great recipes including a fruit dip and overnight French toast. Ingredients: Brown sugar, water, natural maple and butter flavors and extracts, prayer

name: Sunday's Syrup
description:
12 fl. oz.
Sunday's Syrup is a pure treat. We developed our line of maple syrups because you cannot go into the store and by an all natural syrup without corn syrup unless you buy 100% pure maple syrup. This is a wonderful tasting, healthier alternative! Use like any pancake syrup. See our website for some great recipes including a fruit dip, and overnight French toast. Ingredients: Brown sugar, water, cinnamon, pecans, natural maple and butter flavors and extracts, prayer

name: Wild Plum Syrup
description:
12 fl. oz.
The native wild plum grows on small bushes and trees on our land as well as along the road ditches in the sand hills of Nebraska. We hand pick these rare plums in the fall and turn them into wonderful jelly and syrup that have a beautiful color and flavor. Somewhat tart with a sweet finish. We have been told by many this is their favorite. Make it yours today! Ingredients: Sugar, wild plum juice, prayer

name: 8 oz. Wild Plum Jelly
description: The native wild plum grows on small bushes and trees on our land as well as along the road ditches in the sand hills of Nebraska. We hand pick these rare plums in the fall and turn them into wonderful jelly and syrup that have a beautiful color and flavor. Somewhat tart with a sweet finish. We have been told by many this is their favorite. Make it yours today! Ingredients: Sugar, wild plum juice, pectin (dextrose, fumaric acid, fruit pectin), prayer Available in three sizes: 4.5 oz, 8 oz, and 10 oz.!

name: 8 oz. Chokecherry Wine Jelly
description:
I grew up helping my grandmother pick chokecherries along the dirt roads in Wyoming and Nebraska so that she could make wine. I couldn't pass up creating a jelly reminding me of my grandmother. We use chokecherries we hand pick and add a little Chablis to give this jelly a flavor that's almost as good as grandma's wine! 
Ingredients:
Sugar, wild chokecherry juice, Chablis, pectin (dextrose, fumaric acid, fruit pectin), prayer

name: 8 oz. Champagne Blush Jelly
description: What could be better than champagne with strawberries and raspberries? Our wonderful champagne blush jelly! This is a jelly you will want to hide from your family and keep it to yourself. A real treat fit for a queen! Try this poured over cream cheese for a nice appetizer to go along with any party. Ingredients: Sugar, raspberry and strawberry juice, champagne, pectin (dextrose, fumaric acid, fruit pectin), lemon juice, prayer Available in three sizes: 4.5 oz, 8 oz, and 10 oz.!

name: 8 oz. Jalapeno Jelly (Green)
description: When we created our jalapeno jelly, we did so with the thought that jalapeno jelly should be the perfect balance of sweet and heat. This jelly does just that. You get the sweet taste of jelly and as it moves around in your mouth, you get a wonderful taste of spicy jalapenos. We like to serve it over cream cheese with crackers for a quick and easy appetizer. Try it on your favorite tortilla wrap. Spread it on a toasted bun followed by grilled chicken breast for a unique sandwich. Kick up your eggs a notch in the morning with a spoonful of jelly. Ingredients: Sugar, vinegar, peppers, pectin (sucrose, pectin, citric acid, sodium citrate), green food coloring, prayer For more kick try our Hot Jalapeno Jelly! Buy our 3 pack of assorted jalapeno jellies and save! Available in three sizes: 4.5 oz, 8 oz, and 10 oz.!

name: 8 oz. HOT Jalapeno Jelly (Red)
description: We just couldn't have a company in Nebraska without creating a RED jelly!! GO BIG RED!! We took our famous Jalapeno Jelly, added red peppers, added more heat, and the result was fabulous! Makes a great addition not only tailgate parties, but is festive enough to adorn your holiday table. This jelly is great as an appetizer poured over cream cheese. It's also just as great accompanying your favorite meat, eggs, or sandwich. Ingredients: Sugar, vinegar, red and jalapeno peppers, pectin (sucrose, pectin, citric acid and sodium citrate), prayer For a milder flavor try our Green Jalapeno Jelly! Buy our 3 pack of assorted jalapeno jellies and save! Available in three sizes: 4.5 oz, 8 oz, and 10 oz.!

name: 8 oz. Razzmatazz Jalapeno Jelly
description: We took two of our most popular products and put them together for a uniquely wonderful jelly that is one of our bestsellers. We put blueberries, blackberries and raspberries with spicy jalapenos for a sweet, spicy jelly. You won't find another flavor like this anywhere! We serve this over cream cheese for an easy appetizer. Try it with your favorite meat! Ingredients: Sugar, vinegar, jalapeno peppers, raspberries, blueberries, blackberries, pectin (sucrose, pectin, citric acid and sodium citrate), prayer Buy our 3 pack of assorted jalapeno jellies and save! Available in three sizes: 4.5 oz, 8 oz, and 10 oz.!

name: 8 oz. No Sugar Added Razzmatazz Jam
description:
We created this jam because both of my parents are adult diabetic and we wanted something they could enjoy. My youngest son has food issues so we limit white flour and sugar. This is a jam that he can eat with natural peanut butter on whole wheat bread and he still feels like he is eating like other kids. We sweeten the jam with natural fruit juice and use a blend of raspberries, blackberries, and blueberries. This is a great jam for anyone seeking a healthy alternative to traditional jellies and jams.
Ingredients:
Raspberries, blackberries, blueberries, fruit juice concentrate, citrus pectin, prayer

name: 10 oz. Wild Chokecherry Jelly

Chokecherries have been around for many years. In fact, they were first used by Native Americans to preserve their meat. One bite of this unique flavored jelly and you will be hooked on this hard to find flavor. We like to take a sheet cake, pour the jam over the top and finish with whipped topping for a refreshing ice box cake.
